Charge-Up.description: Must use Primary Action on consecutive turns to charge before using attack

Extended Charge.description: Must charge for two turns before using

Triple Charge.description: Must charge three turns before using

Cascade Failure.description: If interrupted during any charge turn, lose ability for rest of combat

Escalating Exposure.description: Each charge turn reduces your Durability by 5

Rooted While Charging.description: Cannot move between charge-up and release

Immobilized.description: Cannot move until end of turn after releasing attack

Anchored.description: If moved from position by any effect, lose charge

Melee.description: The attack you are making is a melee attack

Concentration.description: Lose charge if you take damage or gain conditions

Fragile Concentration.description: Concentration breaks if any character moves adjacent to you

Cascade Failure.description: If concentration broken, you cannot attempt any attack with Concentration for rest of combat

Proximity Sensitivity.description: Concentration breaks if any character moves within 5 spaces of you

Fragile.description: Avoidance becomes 0 while charging, all attacks are critical hits

Beacon.description: All enemies within 30 spaces know your exact location while charging

Vulnerable.description: Take double damage from all sources while charging

Power Lock.description: Disable specific defensive ability while charging, gain points equal to that ability's cost

Extended Lock.description: Disabled ability remains unusable until end of next turn

Multiple Lock.description: Disable second defensive ability, gain its cost in points

System Failure.description: Requires Concentration - If interrupted, all locked abilities unusable for rest of combat

Focused Charging.description: Must also spend Quick Action on charge and release turns

Total Focus.description: Must spend Primary Action, Quick Action, and Movement on charge turns

Ally Coordination.description: Adjacent ally must attack same target you're charging against or charge fails

Reaction Delay.description: Cannot use Reactions while charging, gain points equal to cost of reaction abilities you have purchased

Reserves.description: Can only be used 3 times per combat. Regain all uses after combat ends

Extended Recovery.description: Regain uses after full rest instead of after combat, once per day

Volatile Uses.description: Each time you take damage, lose 1 use

Condition Trigger.description: Each time you gain a condition, lose 1 use

Critical Failure.description: If you roll a natural 1 on any d20, lose 1 use

Life Drain.description: If out of uses, and you would lose 1, take 15 damage instead

Shared Pool.description: Multiple special attacks share same use pool, total uses divided among them, +1 use to the pool for each special attack added

Pool Drain.description: If any attack in pool misses, remove an extra use

Cascade Lock.description: If any attack in pool misses, no attacks in pool can be used for 1 turn

Steady.description: Cannot use until turn 3 of combat

Patient.description: Cannot use until turn 5 of combat

Unhealthy.description: Must be below half HP to use

Timid.description: Cannot use unless you are at full hit points and are not affected by any conditions

Cooldown.description: Cannot use again for 1 turn after use

Cooldown 2.description: Cannot use again for 2 turns after use

Cooldown 3.description: Cannot use again for 3 turns after use

Permanent Injury.description: Each use of this limit, permanantly increases all cooldown cooldown periods by 1 turn, until you take a full rest

Fates.description: Roll a d4-1 when the attack is made, the cooldown is extended by the result

Failure Extension.description: If attack misses or fails effect, cooldown period increases by 1 turn

Doubling Failure.description: If attack misses or fails effect, cooldown period increases by 1 turn

Shared Cooldown.description: Choose 2 other of your special attacks, they can't be used while you are cooling down from this attack

Increased Cooldown.description: Choose 1 of your more special attacks, they can't be used while you are cooling down from this attack

Mass Cooldown.description: All of your special attacks cannot be used while you are cooling down from this attack

Death Proximity.description: Cooldown increases by 1 turn for every 25 HP below maximum

Trigger Extension.description: Taking damage or gaining conditions adds 1 turn to current cooldown

Condition Spiral.description: Conditions aquired last until the end of your cooldown period

Healthy.description: Your cooldowns don't go down unless you are above 50 HP and not affected by any advanced conditions

Pinnacle of Health.description: Your cooldowns don't go down unless you are at max HP and not affected by any conditions

Timid.description: You cannot use this attack unless you are at max HP and not affected by any conditions

Unreliable.description: Roll d20 before use; if under 5, attack fails and action is wasted

Double Check.description: Must make reliability check twice, both must succeed

Stress Breakdown.description: Reliability DC increases by 1 each turn of combat

Rapid Degradation.description: Reliability DC increases by an additional 1 each turn of combat

Health Dependent.description: DC increases by 1 for every 10 HP missing

Fearful.description: DC increases by 5 if an enemy is adjacent to you

Equipment Dependent.description: You have a specific, noticeable and disarmable item, in order to do any attack. There needs to be a reason, you wouldn't always have this item on you. (discuss with GM)

Fragile Gear.description: If you fail the Unreliable roll, the item breaks and won't be fixed until you spend 8 hours, or meet another specified condition (discuss with GM)

Maintenance.description: Equipment breaks if attack fails, requires action to repair

Cascading Failure.description: Each failure increases next reliability DC by 5

Spread Effect.description: Failed checks increase DC for all your special attacks

Critical Cascade.description: Failures in combat make ability unusable for rest of session

Attrition.description: When unreliable roll fails, take 15 damage

Attrition 2.description: When unreliable roll fails, take an additional 15 damage

Concussive Kickback.description: When unreliable roll fails, gain Stun condition, until the start of your next turn

Exhaustive.description: When unreliable roll fails, you must spend an effort or fall unconscious

Combo Move.description: You must have hit an enemy on your last turn

Revenge.description: You must have done damage on inflicted a condition on your last turn

Kill History.description: You must have defeated an enemy on your last turn

Perfect Opening.description: You must have critically hit on your last turn

Follow-Up.description: You must hit the same enemy as you did last turn

Switch Hitter.description: Can only target enemies you have not damaged this combat

First Blood.description: Can only target enemies no ally has damaged this combat

Finishing Move.description: Can only target enemies below half max HP

Ally Setup.description: Ally must have hit the same enemy you're about to attack this turn

Coordination.description: Ally attack must have damaged or inflicted a condition on the same enemy you're about to attack this turn

Perfect Teamwork.description: Must be a specific Ally, chosen when limit taken

Steady.description: Cannot use until turn 3 of combat

Patient.description: Cannot use until turn 5 of combat

Escalation.description: Cannot use until an ally is below half HP

Desperation.description: Cannot use until ally is unconscious

Set Up.description: Must have hit with a specific special attack (chosen when limit taken)

Solid Set Up.description: Must have damaged or inflicted a condition with a specific special attack (chosen when limit taken)

Perfect Opening.description: Must have critically hit with specific special attack

Unhealthy.description: Can only use when below max HP

Unhealthy 2.description: Can only use when at 75 HP or below

Unhealthy 3.description: Can only use when at 50 HP or below

Unhealthy 4.description: Can only use when at 25 HP or below

Unhealthy 5.description: Can only use when at 0 HP or below

Fresh Wound 1.description: Must have taken 15+ damage since the end of your last turn to use

Fresh Wound 2.description: Must have taken 30+ damage since the end of your last turn to use

Continuous Suffering.description: Must have taken damage on every turn for the last 3 turns, cannot be caused by Attrition

Condition Lock.description: Must be afflicted by a condition

Attrition 1.description: Each use costs 15 HP, paid after attack resolves

Attrition X.description: Each successive use costs additional 15 HP (15, 30, 45, etc.)

Concussed.description: You become stunned until the end of your next turn

Desperation.description: Can only use when an ally is at 25 HP or below

Last Resort.description: Can only use when 2+ allies are at 25 HP or below

Avenger.description: Can when an ally is unconscious
